1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>Chaokab a c'ul quin aben Mamin Jehová, yujtol ok'bal in c'ul, cax xiwil chin cusi.</t>
2: <t>Colin elok. Ilabi, yikem inc'al ayach. Colin el a chekbej in ti', yujtol ach chach waoc yipok in c'ul.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Ok' wal a c'ul win Mamin Jehová, masanil c'u chi wal in ba ayach.</t>
4: <t>Mamin, ak' tzaloj in c'ul ayin a chekbej in ti', yujtol a ayach chin txajli.</t>
5: <t>Yujtol watx' ach Mamin, ak'om ach tan yobtakil. Toc'alta' ay a camc'ulal yin eb chi yal ba ayach.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, ab in txaj xin, yet chin k'anon a yabenc'ulal wiban.</t>
7: <t>Yet manxa animaok ay in c'ul chi walon in ba ayach. Chi wil xin tol toc'alta' chin a tak'wej.</t>
8: <t>Tokwal ay junokxa Dios axca wal ach Mamin Jajawil. Tokwal ay juntzanokxa unben chi lajban et Mamin.</t>
9: <pb/><t>A ach Mamin, max a watx'nej masanil mimek conoblak. Ok jay eb yaon ay ba ayach, c'al ul yalon eb watx' k'anej en.</t>
10: <t>Yujtol asan wal ach Dios ach, cax miman ayji ocok, cax c'ayubtakxac'al yoc tzet chonej.</t>
11: <pb/><t>Tx'ox a be ayin Mamin Jehová, yet watx' chin tojcan yul a be tu' yin ikemal. Ak' yun in nabal ti', yet chach ilay can wuj.</t>
12: <t>Ach Wajawil, ach in Diosal, ok walc'alta' watx' k'anej en yin masanil in c'ul. Toc'alta' ok ach wi can yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
13: <t>Yelxac'al miman a camc'ulal win, majto in a cha' ayc'ay bay mukbanil camnak.</t>
14: <pb/><t>Ach Dios, jun wal bulan eb ch'aan chi tit win. C'am yabenc'ulal eb; chi yochej eb chin yak' camok. Man txequelok ayji yul sat eb.</t>
15: <t>Axa ach Mamin, Diosal ach yabenc'ulal, cax miman a camc'ulal jin on. Yelxac'al tol man c'unok tit yowal a c'ul, palta caw wal watx' a c'ul, chak'c'al yun tzet chal ayon.</t>
16: <t>Ilintek, ok'wal a c'ul win. Colin elok, ayin a chekbej in ti', cax ak' epalil ayin.</t>
17: <t>Ak' wil watx'il a c'ul yin tx'ijanil, axa yet ok wilon oc eb ajc'ul oc win, ok q'uixwok aj eb yujtol ach Jehová chach colwaj ayin, cax chin a mimanc'ulneni.</t>
